title: Listing the special rules at a hotel
context: Explain the noise policy and checkout times to a new guest.

content.bestLine: Please note our noise policy and checkout times.

neutral.text: We have a strict noise policy
Late checkout is available upon request
Our staff will assist with any issues

formal.text: We kindly remind you of our noise policy
Checkout time is promptly at 11 AM
We appreciate your cooperation in maintaining a quiet environment
Please be advised of our hotel's rules and regulations
Our hotel staff is available to assist with any concerns
We strive to provide a comfortable stay for all guests

patterns.template: We have a [option] checkout time of [time]

dialogs.description: Hotel staff explaining rules to a new guest

lines.speaker: Hotel Staff
lines.text: Welcome to our hotel, please note our noise policy and checkout times.

lines.speaker: Guest
lines.text: Thank you, what time is checkout?

lines.speaker: Hotel Staff
lines.text: Checkout is at 11 AM sharp, but late checkout is available upon request.

dialogs.description: Hotel staff reminding a guest of the noise policy

lines.speaker: Hotel Staff
lines.text: We kindly remind you of our noise policy, quiet hours start at 10 PM.

lines.speaker: Guest
lines.text: Sorry, I didn't realize it was that late.

lines.speaker: Hotel Staff
lines.text: It's okay, we just want to ensure all guests have a comfortable stay.
